channel.title: Portal disfunction
channel.description: I added a portal, and I made it with 2 options to go to 2 different places, well the first option talks to hans :l and I put the cords to tele me to barrows... I need it not to talk to hans and tele me to barrows..The second option I put up , tele's me to the right place, just not the first one.

item.title: Portal disfunction
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Just add 2 portals…

For the Barrows, Add this Portal:

if (objectID == portalid) { // Portal resetPos(); teleportToX = 3551; // teleport to top floor X Axis teleportToY = 9693; // teleport to top floor Y axis heightLevel = 0; // top floor teleport sendMessage("Welcome to the Barrows."); break; }

Read full topic

item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

I added a portal, and I made it with 2 options to go to 2 different places, well the first option talks to hans :l and I put the cords to tele me to barrows… I need it not to talk to hans and tele me to barrows…The second option I put up , tele’s me to the right place, just not the first one.
